p: The beverages obtained from co-fermenting Cabernet Sauvignon and cherry juice were particularly unpleasant with both yeasts (scores of overall acceptability <0.5/10) ( Figure S1A, Supplementary Materials) due to the note of “chemical–medicinal” flavors. Drinks produced with Chardonnay and cherry juice received a better overall acceptability score, albeit still low (3/10) ( Figure S1B, Supplementary Materials).
